title: Sigh's Kiss
sinopse:
Akira loves his straight friend Tatsuya, who already has a girlfriend. When Akira hears that Tatsuya was dumped, he decides to confess, but the things don’t go quite well... he finds comfort in Tanabe who teases him a lot but can be oddly gentle and understanding at times. Who will Akira choose at the end?
(from B-U)
